_header: Listeneth lordings a new song I shall begin
Title(s): On the Execution of Sir Simon Fraser
_description: On the Execution of Sir Simon Fraser — 233 lines in 8-line stanzas (aaaabccb)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Lystneþ lordynges a newe song ichulle bigynneof þe
                    traytours of scotlond þat take beþ wyþ gynne…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…ant þi knyfWhil him lasteþ þe lyfWiþ
                    þe longe shonkes
